生々しい: (なまなましい) - lively; green; fresh; raw; vivid; graphic
生々世々: (しょうじょうぜぜ) - (yoji) eternity; forever; through all eternity
生々流転: (しょうじょうるてん) - (yoji) all things being in flux through the endless circle of birth, death, and rebirth; the circle of transmigration
生いたち: (おいたち) - growth/development; one's early life/upbringing/personal history
生い立ち: (おいたち) - growth/development; one's early life/upbringing/personal history
生い茂る: (oishigeru) - crescer densamente, estar muito crescido, prosperar, crescer em abundância
生う: (おう) - to grow/to spring up; to cut (teeth)
生えそろう: (はえそろう) - to all come in (e.g. teeth); to all come out (e.g. seedlings, flowers)
生える: (はえる) - to grow/to spring up/to sprout; to cut (teeth)
生え変わる: (はえかわる) - to be replaced with new growth
生え揃う: (はえそろう) - to all come in (e.g. teeth); to all come out (e.g. seedlings, flowers)
生え際: (はえぎわ) - (receding) hairline; borders of the hair
生かじり: (なまかじり) - superficial knowledge/smattering; dabbler/dilettante; dipping into
生かす: (いかす) - to make (the best) use of/to leverage (skills, attributes, experience, etc.)/to capitalise on (experience, etc); to let live/to keep alive; to revive/to resuscitate
生かる: (いかる) - (esp. 生かる, 活かる) to be arranged (flowers, etc.)/to be on display; (esp. 埋かる) to be buried
生き: (iki) - viver, estar vivo; frescor, vivacidade, vitalidade, viver, estar vivo; frescor, vivacidade, vitalidade; situação em que um grupo de pedras não pode ser capturado porque contém duas ou mais lacunas (no jogo de go); mantenha
生きかえる: (いきかえる) - to revive; to come to oneself; to be restored to life
生きがい: (いきがい) - something one lives for; purpose in life; raison d'être
生きざま: (いきざま) - attitude to life; form of existence; way of life
生きた化石: (いきたかせき) - living fossil; relict
生きていかれない: (いきていかれない) - can't survive (without ...)
生きている化石: (いきているかせき) - living fossil
生きて行かれない: (いきていかれない) - can't survive (without ...)
生きて行く: (いきていく) - to subsist; to keep on living
生きとし生けるもの: (いきとしいけるもの) - all living things; all God's creatures, great and small
生きとし生ける物: (いきとしいけるもの) - all living things; all God's creatures, great and small
生きのびる: (いきのびる) - to survive; to live long
生きる: (いきる) - to live/to exist; to make a living/to subsist; to be in effect/to be in use/to function; to come to life/to be enlivened; to be safe (in baseball, go, etc.)
生き仏: (いきぼとけ) - saintly person; living Buddha
生き体: (いきたい) - {sumo} still having slim chances of victory
生き作り: (いきづくり) - slicing a fish and presenting it at table in its original form; slices of fresh raw fish arranged to look lifelike
生き地獄: (いきじごく) - hell on earth; living hell
生き字引: (いきじびき) - walking dictionary or encyclopedia
生き字引き: (いきじびき) - walking dictionary or encyclopedia
生き存える: (いきながらえる) - to live long; to survive
生き存らえる: (いきながらえる) - to live long; to survive
生き延びる: (いきのびる) - to survive; to live long
生き急ぐ: (いきいそぐ) - to live fast (and recklessly)
生き恥をさらす: (いきはじをさらす) - to expose oneself to ridicule
生き恥を曝す: (いきはじをさらす) - to expose oneself to ridicule
生き抜く: (いきぬく) - to live through; to survive
生き方: (いきかた) - way of life; how to live
生き様: (いきざま) - attitude to life; form of existence; way of life
生き永らえる: (いきながらえる) - to live long; to survive
生き生きとする: (いきいきとする) - to scintillate; to freshen/to come alive
生き甲斐: (いきがい) - something one lives for; purpose in life; raison d'être
生き神様: (いきがみさま) - living god; saintly person
生き続ける: (いきつづける) - to carry on/to go on with one's life; to keep alive/to stay alive/to survive
生き肝: (いきぎも) - liver taken from a living animal
生き胆: (いきぎも) - liver taken from a living animal
生き腐れ: (いきぐされ) - (fish) appearing fresh but actually gone bad
生き身: (いきみ) - living body/flesh and blood; fresh fish
生き身は死に身: (いきみはしにみ) - all that lives must eventually die
生き身は死身: (いきみはしにみ) - all that lives must eventually die
生き返る: (いきかえる) - to revive; to come to oneself; to be restored to life
生き長らえる: (いきながらえる) - to live long; to survive
生き霊: (いきすだま) - vengeful spirit (spawned from a person's hate)/doppelgänger/co-walker/wraith; (せいれい only) mankind/souls/people
生き顔: (いきがお) - face of someone while still alive
生き馬の目を抜く: (いきうまのめをぬく) - to catch a weasel asleep; to pluck out the eye of a live horse
生き魑魅: (いきすだま) - vengeful spirit (spawned from a person's hate)/doppelgänger/co-walker/wraith; (せいれい only) mankind/souls/people
生く: (いく) - (v2k-k,v4k,vi)    to live/to exist; (v2k-s,vt)    to bring to life
生ける: (いける) - to arrange (flowers)/to plant; (生ける only) living/live
生け作り: (いけづくり) - slicing a fish and presenting it at table in its original form; slices of fresh raw fish arranged to look lifelike
生け捕り: (いけどり) - capturing something alive; something captured alive
生け捕る: (いけどる) - to capture alive; to take prisoner; to catch alive
生け擒: (いけどり) - capturing something alive; something captured alive

生け花: (いけばな) - flower arrangement; (せいか only) fresh flowers
